attributes.action: Hold a national inquiry into the "grooming gang" scandal
attributes.additional_details: Because like many other people I believe this is an issue of national significance and cannot be fully addressed by local-specific inquiries.
attributes.background: I want the Government to hold a national inquiry into the "grooming gang" or child sexual exploitation scandal

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
